trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There was one other sighting in Phoenix on or around May 10th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsHeard heavy rumbling like helicopter was landing on my lawn went out to see. Very dark (Black) helicopter chasing the orb over my house flying south then orb changed direction went towards the Airport and helicopter broke off pursuit. they were between 500 and 1000 feet alt.
